rComments: By far the worst professor I've had at UCSC. He's condescending, sarcastic and doesn't care about students' needs. I dreaded going to this class and am so happy it's over. The curve was really low so it's not hard to get a good grade, but it's the teacher that makes the class a drag.

Probably one of the best teachers at UCSC, one of the HARDEST classes I have ever taken but it was worth it, he is loud and in your face and it is hilarious, he learns everyone's name and cold calls a lot. If you slack off he will make fun of you in front of the entire class, class was never boring. If you can handle hard work take this class.

His class is no joke, but he was probably the best professor I had at SC.  Take this class, even if u get a C, I think it's worth it.  And yeah, this dude is laughs.  Very personal teacher, knew everybody's name by the end of the quarter and just wouldn't stop clowning on accountants haha

One of the funniest professor I ever had!!!! It's an 8am class, but everyone's so awake and excited in his lecture!! not much hw, exams are not too easy, but he gives huge curves. I loved his class!!!
